snippet: The discovery of a small network of brain cells holds the potential to advance to treatment of eating disorders in people.
abstract: Scientists have discovered small network of cells in mouse brain that turns appetite on and off; discovery may eventually lead to better understanding and treatment of eating disorders in humans.
lead_paragraph: The discovery of a small network of brain cells holds the potential to advance to treatment of eating disorders in people.

headline.print_headline: A Mouse Switch Turns Off Appetite
headline.main: A Mouse Switch Turns Off Appetite
